clang-analyzer-unix.BlockInCriticalSecti.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-unix.BlockInCriticalSection
Check for calls to blocking functions inside a critical section.
The
clang-analyzer-unix.BlockInCriticalSection
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-unix.BlockInCriticalSecti.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
